lead_paragraph: After being one of the hottest teams in the NBA before the All-Star break, the Utah Jazz were in danger of losing more ground in the playoff race Tuesday night.

headline.print_headline: OT Win Lifts Jazz Past Rockets Into 8th Place
headline.main: OT Win Lifts Jazz Past Rockets Into 8th Place

snippet: After being one of the hottest teams in the NBA before the All-Star break, the Utah Jazz were in danger of losing more ground in the playoff race Tuesday night....
